attributes.additional_details: Following a lengthy campaign by our community to acquire part of Devoran Old School for use by Devoran Pre-School, Feock Parish Council successfully purchased a lease of the Market Hall site on the understanding that Devoran Pre-School would be given a much needed new home there. In good faith Devoran Pre-School entered into negotiations with Feock Parish Council until Feock Parish Council broke off all negotiations in early July and announced that the premises would be put out to commercial tender.Devoran Pre-School now faces an uncertain future. If the Market Hall site is aquired by a commercial Pre-School, the current community run Devoran Pre-School may be forced to close!
